  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Server
    handles incoming connections from clients and contains a queue for matching clients and starting a game.
    ServerClientHandler
    manages the communication between a client and the server.
    ServerConnection
    uses the Protocol to communicate with a client using the framework of SocketConnection.
    ServerGameManager
    manages a game between two clients.
    SocketServer
    Implements a networking server which accepts connection from clients.
